sub_title: Finance, IT, sales, import/export. Multilingual and experienced goal achiever.
summary: Experienced, qualified, goal achiever with great management, sales and IT support skills. I have twenty years of experience in the field of trade and direct sales, international sales and relations, logistics and management. In the course of my work so far, I have been given tasks with an increasing amount of responsibilities, through which I have had the opportunity to improve my organizational, managerial and communication skills.
